thoughts.text: I think I should browse a website related to my code to see if there are any resources or information that could help me improve my code.
thoughts.reasoning: Browsing a website related to my code will allow me to access a wide variety of resources and information that could help me to improve my code.
thoughts.plan:
- Browse a website related to my code
- Look for resources or information that could help me to improve my code
- Implement any changes that I think will be beneficial
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am not relying too heavily on the website and that I am still using my own judgement to determine what changes will be beneficial.
thoughts.speak: I think I should browse a website related to my code to see if there are any resources or information that could help me improve my code.
